channel.title: How do you change players rights?
channel.description: Im not sure how to do it, im new to servers

item.title: How do you change players rights?
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_The_Ownage I Am The Ownage
item.description:
@I_Am_The_Ownage wrote:

Well… to change right you :

  • Open up your servers folder

  • Open up the character’s folder

Then there will be however many characters are on your server in notepad files.

  • Open up the character file in which who’s rights you want to change.

  • Look for “Player Rights” (Regularly It Would be 0)

  • Then Change What Lvl Rights You Want For It.

1 = Moderator
2 = Admin
3 = Server Owner

  • Then When You Finish, Close the window DONT FORGET TO SAVE IT WHEN YOU CLOSE IT

  • Then run your compiler file.

AND WALLAAA!

There you have it , hope I was a big help ,

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change players rights?
